CBoundAppendable - Class in sztejkat.abstractfmt.util
A string-builder like class which implements Appendable contract which throws EFormatBoundaryExceeded if an attempt is made to put too many data into it.
CBoundAppendable(int) - Constructor for class sztejkat.abstractfmt.util.CBoundAppendable
Creates, pre allocating buffer of specified limit
CCharExchangeBuffer - Class in sztejkat.abstractfmt.util
A simplified toolbox class which is intended to be used for testing purpose of character based formats and provides an ability to write and read characters from a certain buffer.
